[The `modelsummary` package website](https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/modelsummary/) hosts a large number of vignettes, case studies, and technical documents.

Vignettes:

- [Data summaries](https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/modelsummary/articles/datasummary.html)
    - `datasummary`: Unlimited power.
    - `datasummary_skim`: Dataset overviews.
    - `datasummary_balance`: Balance tables.
    - `datasummary_correlation`: Correlation tables.
    - `datasummary_crosstab`: Nested cross-tabs.
- [Model summaries]
    - [`modelsummary`:](https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/modelsummary/articles/modelsummary.html) Regression tables (ultra-cu)
    - [`modelplot`:](https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/modelsummary/articles/modelplot.html) Regression plots
- [Customizing the look of your tables](https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/modelsummary/articles/appearance.html)
- [Index of Functions and Documentation](https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/modelsummary/reference/index.html)
